Articles.Content:
i get a giant tank destroyer and blow up your tank.

my hill with giant tank destroyer.

\*death star\*

My Death Star.

I crash a moon into your Death Star and I use the debris to construct a planet with a hill on it.

My hill on a planet.

I pile you and your hill with a whole bunch of space debris from Earth.

My junkyard/Hill!

I build a mountain so it blocks the sunlight in the mourning to your hill.

CelticCossack51's hill
I fly to a different hill. my hill

I move the hill while you are not looking.

My hill.

I move the hill so the hill crushes you into smithereens.

My hill.

I put you inside of shrodinger's box.

Possibly my hill.

I breach the box wall, leave the box, then put you inside of it and actually activates the box, killing you. Then I burn the box. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My hill.

I may have been killed, but because of the nature of Schrodinger's box I am alive in an alternate universe, and in that alternate universe I take over the hill again.

My hill in an alternate universe.
the now-technically illegal megaverse Invades your universe because you legalised parallel universes

megatiger78, I would like to request if you could stop talking about megaverses, kionicles, space ponies or marines. That is annoying everyone.

I make a hill, and put a giant railgun turret (to destroy stuff in orbit) on it.

My hill with a railgun turret.

\*EMP\*

my hill with railgun turret
I made a bad pee joke about your name. You fall of your hill, crying. You deactivated your turret because my joke was so bad.

i kill u. (note: you did not claim the hill so HA!)

my hill with reactivated turret.

I have been standing on the hill this whole time while all of you were fighting, so I scare you off the hill and claim it.

My hill.

\* /kill mikeman7918 \*

my hill

Quantum nonsense happens.

My hill.

\*blackhole\*

no ones hill

/revive mikeman7918

\*mikeman7918 revived

/edit quantumNonsense.objBlackHole.location = somewhere else.

\*black hole moved

/give objHill to mikeman7918

\*my hill

/execute: do not execute this command

CONSOLE ERROR: 978

REVERTING TO ORIGINAL

25%

75%

100%

RESET COMPLETE

/claim hill.entity

HILL NOW BELONGS TO PenguinsMeep

\*death star\* 

my empty multiverse
\*pop\* my space station that randomly appeared

Luckily! My overpowered ship from my modded FTL game is here too! Golden heavy dual laser charger fire! PEW PEW! Shields down, room breached! Plasma thrower, fire! Room fully filled with fire. Fire expanding into oxygen system room. Oxygen system busted. You are doomed. I will claim this hill.
